400+ lives. 30 seconds. A catastrophic failure. A test of pure skill, experience & composure.

On Dec 3, 2019, @airindia AI-965, a Boeing 747-400 (VT-EVA), was just seconds from landing in Hyderabad when both left-wing ailerons jammed UP at 300 feet.
